SqlRetryLogicOption.summary: Provides the retry logic parameters to create an instance of the class by using methods.

example.para: The following sample declares a object that is configured to apply retry logic for the error number 102 for a maximum of 5 times and 3 to 60 seconds gap time between each run. It will only work for the SELECT SQL statements assigned to the .

NumberOfTries.summary: Sets the number of times to try and execute the function.
NumberOfTries.value: between 1 and 60; 1 means to execute one time and if an error is encountered, don't retry.

DeltaTime.summary: Sets the gap time interval as a object.
DeltaTime.value: The upcoming gap time before the next execution attempt; must be between 0 and 120 seconds.

MinTimeInterval.summary: Sets the minimum allowed gap time interval as a object.
MinTimeInterval.value: The minimum upcoming gap time before the next execution attempt; the default value is zero and must be between 0 and 120 seconds.

MaxTimeInterval.summary: Sets the allowed maximum gap time interval as a object.
MaxTimeInterval.value: The maximum upcoming gap time interval before the next execution attempt; must be between 0 and 120 seconds.

TransientErrors.summary: Sets the list of transient error numbers on which to retry when they occur.
TransientErrors.value: List of ; Set to to use the internal list of exceptions from the object.

AuthorizedSqlCondition.summary: Sets a pre-retry validation function on the to only include specific SQL statements.
AuthorizedSqlCondition.value: The pre-retry validation delegate function; if the is authorized to retry the operation.
